channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pope strongly backs US bishops in blasting Trump immigration crackdown, urges humane treatment
item.description: Pope Leo XIV has strongly backed U.S. bishops who condemned the Trump administration’s immigration crackdown

item.title: After backlash, Alabama Public Television will keep paying for PBS
item.description: The commission that oversees Alabama Public Television voted to continue paying its contract with PBS

item.title: NYC's fiscal chief wants a trial over his immigration protest arrest
item.description: New York City's chief fiscal officer, Brad Lander, has decided to go to trial on a misdemeanor obstruction charge

item.title: Final resting place of historic SS United States to become artificial reef by Florida
item.description: A historic ocean liner will become the world’s largest artificial reef after it’s sunk off Florida’s Gulf Coast early next year

item.title: Settlement calls for NPR to get $36M in government funds to operate public radio
item.description: National Public Radio will receive approximately $36 million in government funding to operate the nation’s public radio interconnection system under t...
